name: Country Girl Keiko
detailed_description:
Keiko lives in a small countryside village named Kokko. Here she attends the local agricultural university.

This university is very strict, and she is asked by a professor to help get some troublesome students to stop skipping classes.

However, Keiko is socially awkward, and needs to learn how to interact with others.

Features:

  • Slice of Life RPG
  • Explore a Japanese country village
  • Multiple Endings
  • Help Keiko become more self-confident
about_the_game:
Keiko lives in a small countryside village named Kokko. Here she attends the local agricultural university.

This university is very strict, and she is asked by a professor to help get some troublesome students to stop skipping classes.

However, Keiko is socially awkward, and needs to learn how to interact with others.

Features:

  • Slice of Life RPG
  • Explore a Japanese country village
  • Multiple Endings
  • Help Keiko become more self-confident
short_description: Play as Keiko, a socially awkward woman living in a small country village. Explore the town and help her overcome her social anxiety, so she can thrive at her university.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.

content_descriptors.notes: Country Girl Keiko contains strong language and partial nudity.
